title: Blinded
excerpt: A blinded creature can't see and automatically fails ability checks requiring sight. Attack rolls against the creature have Advantage, and its attack rolls have Disadvantage.
markdown: # Blinded While you have the Blinded condition, you experience the following effects: * **Can't See.** You can't see and automatically fail any ability check that requires sight. * **Attacks Affected.** Attack rolls against you have Advantage, and your attack rolls have Disadvantage.
